text: Todayâ€™s spotlight is on the genart pioneer Christian Cavadia. Born 1933 in Romania he later worked in Paris at the ARTA (later transformed to Centre Pompidou). Asides applying generative systems to fashion, he developed parameter-based generative systems that allowed users to create their own computer drawings.
